thread.title: B-Town celebs wish Happy Dussehra to fans
thread.title_full: B-Town celebs wish Happy Dussehra to fans - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: B-Town celebs wish Happy Dussehra to fans
text:
*New Delhi, Oct.22 (ANI): Bollywood celebs seem to be filled with the spirit of Dussehra, as they took to social media to wish their fans.*
New Delhi, Oct.22 (ANI): Bollywood celebs seem to be filled with the spirit of Dussehra, as they took to social media to wish their fans. Bollywood's Perfectionist Aamir Khan took to his Twitter page to wish his fans and wrote, "Happy Dussehra. Love. a." Wishing his fans, veteran actor Amitabh Bachchan wrote, "T 2034 - On the auspicious day of Dussehra .. my wishes and prayers for all .. Good always prevails over evil !!" Asking his fans for a fresh start, Akshay Kumar wrote, "Wishing you all a very #HappyDussehra! May it be the end of all negativity and start of new and positive beginnings :) Love & Light." Also, Canadian actress Lisa Ray wrote, "Happy Dussehra to all! Tamaso ma jyotirgamaya Lead me from darkness to light." The 'Kal Ho Naa Ho' actress Preity Zinta tweeted, Happy Dussehra to all of you who celebrate today May the darkness inside & outside be illuminated by love & light loads of love always. Bipasha Basu shared a pic of herself and captioned it as, "Happy Dusshehra Beautiful People." Other who wished fans on this occasion included actor Emraan Hashmi, Kriti Sanon and Shruti Haasan among others.(ANI) Â»
